org.cantaloupe.player

Class PlayerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cantaloupe.player.PlayerManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IInjectable<Player>

    public class PlayerManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IInjectable<Player>
    A class used to manage players.
    Author:
    Dylan Scheltens
